titleStmt.title: Here is a true and just account of a most horrid and bloody plot conspired against His most sacred Majesty and His royal Highnes by the wicked contrivances of Colonel John Rumsay, Richard Nelthorp, Edward Wade, Richard Goodenough, Captain Walcot, William Thompson, James Burton, and William Hone since which time there is an account that Colonel John Rumsay is taken, and hath been upon his examination.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
